snippet.title: The Nightmare Escape Teaser
snippet.description:
Wishlist The Nightmare Escape on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2451340/The_Nightmare_Escape/

The Nightmare Escape is an upcoming first person horror game about being trapped in your own nightmare.  Navigate through your nightmares in this immersive first-person horror game. Explore a mysterious abandoned apartment building and unlock four unique interconnected short stories and piece together the puzzles to escape your nightmare.

Developed by HALbot Studios in collaboration with DarksalyerTV in Unreal Engine 5
Music and sound by Little Further Productions 

HALbot Studios:
Website: https://www.halbotstudios.com/
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@halbotstudios
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/search/?developer=HALbot%20Studios
Twitter: https://twitter.com/halbotstudios
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/halbotstudios/
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/hal451
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/halbotstudios
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@halbotstudios

DarkslayerTV:
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@darkslayertv
Twitter: https://twitter.com/DarkslayerTV

Little Further Productions
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@LittleFurther 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/littlefurtherproductions/

The Nightmare Escape is a thrilling first-person horror game that takes players on an unforgettable journey through the depths of fear and the enigmatic realms of the mind. Unravel the mysteries of an experiment gone wrong that traps Mia Crowe in a coma. In order to recover, Mia must navigate four of the darkest paths of her mind to escape.
Immerse yourself in an anthology of four interconnected nightmares, each offering a unique and chilling experience. You awaken in a dimly lit apartment with no memory of how you arrived there. As you explore the eerie rooms and unlock their secrets, fragmented memories begin to surface, revealing a disturbing truth about your past and the nightmarish circumstances that have trapped you.

Key Features:

- A chilling anthology of four unique interconnected nightmares
- Atmospheric and immersive first-person horror experience
- Intricate puzzles that test your wit and logic
- Uncover the dark secrets of the apartment through fragmented memories
- Encounter otherworldly entities that lurk in the shadows
- Engrossing narrative with psychological twists and revelations
- Stunning visuals and haunting audio design that enhance the eerie atmosphere
- Unravel the truth behind your own nightmare and find a way to escape

Checkout The Nightmare Escape on Steam and be sure to wishilst The Nightmare Escape on Steam

The Nightmare Escape is made in Unreal Engine 5.
